access: You are from the Eye of Dread region.
markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 2"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Lastwall Sentry Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=882) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Uncommon" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=159" />
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
<trait label="Dedication" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=41" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [World Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=6) pg. 47 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

**Archetype** [Lastwall Sentry](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=15)

**Prerequisites**
member of the Knights of Lastwall; [Shield Block](/Feats.aspx?ID=839)

**Access**
You are from the Eye of Dread region.

</column>

---

You’ve sworn yourself as a sentry for the Knights of Lastwall, the first line of defense against incursions by the Whispering Tyrant throughout Golarion. You become trained in [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) and in Undead [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8); if you were already trained, you become an expert instead. Finally, you gain the [Reactive Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=360) fighter feat.

**Special** You can't select another dedication feat until you have gained two other feats from the Lastwall sentry archetype.

<title level="2">Lastwall Sentry Dedication leads to...</title>
[Always Ready](/Feats.aspx?ID=3597), [Bless Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=3598), [Eye of Ozem](/Feats.aspx?ID=883), [Familiar Foe](/Feats.aspx?ID=3599), [Final Rest](/Feats.aspx?ID=3600), [Flashing Shield](/Feats.aspx?ID=3605), [Grave Sense](/Feats.aspx?ID=885), [Grave Sight](/Feats.aspx?ID=3607), [Lastwall Warden](/Feats.aspx?ID=887), [Necromantic Bulwark](/Feats.aspx?ID=3606), [Necromantic Resistance](/Feats.aspx?ID=884), [No Stranger to Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=3608), [Nonlethal Takedown](/Feats.aspx?ID=3601), [Practiced Opposition](/Feats.aspx?ID=3602), [Repulse the Wicken](/Feats.aspx?ID=3603), [Rescuer's Press](/Feats.aspx?ID=2167), [Resolute Defender](/Feats.aspx?ID=3609), [Sacred Armaments](/Feats.aspx?ID=3604), [Thwart Evil](/Feats.aspx?ID=3610), [Withstand Death](/Feats.aspx?ID=3611)
name: Lastwall Sentry Dedication
prerequisite: member of the Knights of Lastwall; Shield Block
